blocks.name: bj-elid
blocks.content: Characterization of the elements of ` _I ` . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-elid(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cid), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cid), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  jca(wcel(c0, cid), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cid), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cid))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cid))
  eleq1d(c0, cid, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(c0, cid))
  syl(wcel(c0, cid), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sseli(c0, cid, cxp(universe, universe))
  mpbi(wss(cid, cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(cid))
  reli()
  df-rel(cid)
  imp(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(c0, cid))
  syl5bir(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cid))
  bitri(wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cid), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), copab(hs0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eleq2i(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cid, copab(hs0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  df-id(hs0, hs1)
  opelopaba(hs0, hs1, cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  fvex(c1st, c0)
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  eqeq12(cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  biimprd(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cid), wcel(c0, cid))
  eleq1d(c0, cid, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  1st2nd2(c0, universe, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c1st, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c1st, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
}

blocks.name: bj-elid3
blocks.content: Characterization of the couples in ` _I ` . (Contributed by BJ, 29-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-elid3(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cid), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(c0, c1)))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cid), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)))))
  bj-elid(cop(c0, c1))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(c0, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  opelxp(c0, c1, universe, universe)
  bitri(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(c0, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(c0, c1)))
  pm5.32i(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c1)), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c1)), c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  op1stg(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  op2ndg(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  impbii(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(c0, c1)))
  anim1i(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, universe))
  simpl(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  jca31(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wceq(c0, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(c0, c1))
  biimpac(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, universe))
  eleq1(c0, c1, universe)
  simpr(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(c0, c1))
}

thm bj-elid3(class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (< c0, c1 > âˆˆ = â†”(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c0 = c1))
} = {
  bitri(< c0, c1 > âˆˆ =, (c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c0 = c1), (< c0, c1 > âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§(1st ` < c0, c1 >)=(2nd ` < c0, c1 >)))
  bj-elid(< c0, c1 >)
  bitri((< c0, c1 > âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§(1st ` < c0, c1 >)=(2nd ` < c0, c1 >)), (c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c0 = c1), ((c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)âˆ§(1st ` < c0, c1 >)=(2nd ` < c0, c1 >)))
  anbi1i(< c0, c1 > âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), (1st ` < c0, c1 >)=(2nd ` < c0, c1 >), (c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ))
  opelxp(c0, c1, universe, universe)
  bitri(((c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)âˆ§(1st ` < c0, c1 >)=(2nd ` < c0, c1 >)), (c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c0 = c1), ((c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)âˆ§ c0 = c1))
  pm5.32i((c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ), (1st ` < c0, c1 >)=(2nd ` < c0, c1 >), c0 = c1)
  eqeq12d((1st ` < c0, c1 >), (2nd ` < c0, c1 >), c0, c1, (c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ))
  op1stg(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  op2ndg(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  impbii(((c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)âˆ§ c0 = c1), (c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c0 = c1))
  anim1i((c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ), c0 = c1, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  simpl(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  jca31((c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c0 = c1), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c0 = c1)
  simpl(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c0 = c1)
  biimpac(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c0 = c1, c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  eleq1(c0, c1, universe)
  simpr(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c0 = c1)
}

blocks.name: bj-elid4
